marklogic.body:
Obama supporters are now going to bash the only candidate who votes against war(obamas's and bushs wars) the patriot Act(GW bush) raising taxes, the NDAA(Obama) and sopa(Obama), oh oh and the unfair war on drugs, and not to mention the guy who gave FREE health care to the poor. Obama and the "progressive liberals" are just confused they think thier views trump everything regardless.
That is called Fascism, and not seeing others views or even trying makes you the BIGOT
Stop the BUSH OBAMA agenda they are taking our individual liberty, and destroying our constitution, the only thing we have to fight the government.
Educate your Bleeding hearts before you throw your vote behind these warmongers
No Obama No romney,santorum
Vote truth Vote liberty Vote for our constitution Vote for true equality Vote Ron Paul 2012
